title: Force exerted on piston during process XY

content.description: A closed chamber filled with a gas that is modeled as ideal has a movable piston of area A. The graph above of pressure P as a function of volume V shows three processes that make up cycle XYZX through which the gas is taken. Process ZX is isothermal.
content.question: What is the force exerted on the piston by the gas during process XY ?

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
